231188-d-11-23-88-KJRY.Narrative: THE CAUSE OF THIS ACCIDENT WAS A SCREW UP ON THE PART OF A SHORT LINE RAILROADER (TRAINMAN) WHO BACKED THE TRAIN THRU A SWITCH. HE DID NOT REALIZE REAR END OF TRAIN HAD RUN THRU SWITCH WHEN HE GAVE THE HIGHBALL TO PROCEED. SHORT LINE RAILROADER IN MOTOR (MOTORMAN) OPENED THROTTLE AND TRAIN SPLIT SWITCH WITH ONE CAR HAVING FRONT TRUCKS ON ONE TRACK AND REAR TRUCK ON A SECOND TRACK. THIS DERAILED THREE LOADED TANK CARS OF HIGH FRUCTOSE CORN SYRUP AND TORE UP THREE SWITCHES IN THE THROAT OF THE KEOKUK UNION DEPOT YARD. AS INFORMATION, KUD OWNS NO MOTIVE POWER, HAS NO CREW, HAS NO EMPLOYEES, AND ONLY OWNS THE TRACK AND SWITCHES THAT GOT MESSED UP IN THIS ACCIDENT. NO OTHER CONSISTS INVOLVED. NOD/A TEST MADE. NO HAZARDOUS MATERIALS INVOLVED. TRAIN WAS KEOKUK TO LAHARPE PATROL, A LOCAL FREIGHTTRAIN.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone
